description: Detailed courses for each track in the Software Engineering Graduate Program

courses.title: Introduction to Programming with Python
courses.description: Learn Python fundamentals including variables, control flow, functions, and object-oriented programming
learning_outcomes: Write basic Python programs using variables and data types
Use control structures (if/else, loops) effectively
Create and use functions with parameters and return values
Understand object-oriented programming basics

courses.title: Data Structures Fundamentals
courses.description: Master essential data structures including arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and graphs
learning_outcomes: Implement common data structures from scratch
Choose appropriate data structures for different problems
Analyze time and space complexity of operations
Optimize code using efficient data structures

courses.title: Algorithm Design and Analysis
courses.description: Study classic algorithms for searching, sorting, recursion, and dynamic programming
learning_outcomes: Implement sorting algorithms (merge sort, quick sort, etc.)
Solve problems using recursion and backtracking
Apply dynamic programming to optimization problems
Analyze algorithm efficiency using Big O notation

courses.title: Modern Front-End Development with React
courses.description: Build interactive user interfaces with React, including hooks, state management, and routing
learning_outcomes: Create React components using functional components and hooks
Manage application state with useState and useContext
Implement routing with React Router
Fetch and display data from APIs
Style components with CSS modules and styled-components

courses.title: Back-End Development with Node.js
courses.description: Build RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL with authentication
learning_outcomes: Create Express servers with multiple routes and middleware
Design and implement PostgreSQL database schemas
Build RESTful APIs following best practices
Implement JWT-based authentication
Handle errors and validate user input

courses.title: Full Stack Integration and Deployment
courses.description: Connect front-end to back-end, implement testing, and deploy to production
learning_outcomes: Integrate React front-end with Express back-end
Write unit and integration tests
Configure CORS and handle security concerns
Deploy applications to Heroku and Vercel
Set up CI/CD pipelines

courses.title: Microservices Architecture
courses.description: Design and build scalable microservices using Docker, message queues, and API gateways
learning_outcomes: Design microservices architectures following best practices
Containerize applications with Docker
Implement inter-service communication
Use message queues for asynchronous processing
Set up API gateways and service discovery

courses.title: Cloud Computing with AWS
courses.description: Deploy and manage applications on AWS using EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda, and more
learning_outcomes: Deploy applications to EC2 instances
Store files in S3 buckets
Set up managed databases with RDS
Create serverless functions with Lambda
Configure VPCs, security groups, and IAM roles

courses.title: DevOps and CI/CD
courses.description: Implement automated testing, continuous integration, and continuous deployment pipelines
learning_outcomes: Set up GitHub Actions workflows
Implement automated testing in CI pipelines
Deploy applications automatically on code changes
Use Kubernetes for container orchestration
Monitor applications with logging and metrics

courses.title: Capstone Project Development
courses.description: Design, build, and deploy a full-stack application showcasing all learned skills
learning_outcomes: Define project requirements and create technical specifications
Design system architecture and database schema
Build full-stack application with modern technologies
Implement testing and deployment pipelines
Present project to technical and non-technical audiences

courses.title: Technical Interview Preparation
courses.description: Master coding interviews, system design interviews, and behavioral interviews
learning_outcomes: Solve LeetCode-style coding problems efficiently
Design scalable systems in whiteboard interviews
Explain technical concepts clearly
Answer behavioral questions using STAR method
Negotiate compensation packages
